io.atomix.copycat.client

Interface ConnectionStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionStrategies

    public interface ConnectionStrategy
    Connection strategies define how clients should handle initializing connections to the cluster.

    Connection strategies are used by the CopycatClient at startup to indicate how to handle failures when connecting to the cluster. When a client is first started, the client will attempt to any server listed in the address list provided to the client at startup. If the client fails to register a new session with any server, the connection strategy will dictate how to handle the failure.

    Connection strategies are used in the same manner when attempting to recover a lost session. In the event that a client's connection to the cluster is lost and the client must register a new session, if recovering the client's session fails then the connection strategy will again dictate how to handle the failure.

    Author:

      • Nested Class Summary

        Nested Classes 
        Modifier and Type Interface and Description
        static interface  ConnectionStrategy.Attempt
        Represents a failed attempt at connecting to the server.

      • Method Summary

        All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
        Modifier and Type Method and Description
        void attemptFailed(ConnectionStrategy.Attempt attempt)
        Handles the failure of an attempt to connect to the cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • attemptFailed

        void attemptFailed(ConnectionStrategy.Attempt attempt)
        Handles the failure of an attempt to connect to the cluster.

        This method will be called for each failed attempt to connect to the cluster. Connection attempt failures result when the client fails to connect to and establish a session with any known server in the cluster. Thus, by the time this method is called the client will have attempted communication with every server specified to the client.

        Connection strategies can choose how to react to a failed attempt to connect to the cluster by either retrying or failing the attempt. In the event that a connection attempt is failed, the associated CompletableFuture will be completed exceptionally.

        Parameters:
        attempt - The failed attempt.
